Now close the Network Connections window, which will restart your network adapter and attempt to validate its settings. Windows will try to renew the IP address automatically.

6. **Check for connectivity:** After restarting your network adapter, open a web browser (like Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge) and attempt to access a website. If everything is set up correctly, you should now be able to browse the internet.
